text:
Hey all, I wanted to put a feeler out to see if anyone might know of someone in the DC / Baltimore metro areas or Southern PA looking for a position on the marketing side of the office. We're looking for someone mid-level with some experience under their belt, especially if that experience is in construction, contracting, renewable energy, or related industries. Feel free to DM if you think you might know someone or have any questions, or forward them to our Indeed posting:

<https://www.indeed.com/company/Illumine8-Marketing-and-PR/jobs/Marketing-Coordinator-99dfa5d445b2c1d0?fccid=aec56f7bff65219c&vjs=3>

Thanks!
